mapper.select:
SELECT f.cityCode FROM tbl_order_report_income_file f WHERE 1=1
AND f.cityCode IS NOT NULL AND f.effective=1
AND (ISNULL(f.cityCode) OR f.effective=2)
GROUP BY f.cityCode
SELECT * FROM tbl_order_report_income_file WHERE cityCode = #{cityCode} ORDER BY createTime DESC limit 1

SELECT count(1) FROM tbl_customer_agency a WHERE a.signStatus = 2 AND a.STATUS = 1
AND a.cooperativeModeId=#{cooperativeModeId}

SELECT b.cooperativeAgencyId AS agencyId
,SUM(l.lendingAmount) AS loanAmount ,COUNT(DISTINCT l.orderNo) AS orderCount ,SUM(l.income) AS income
,COUNT(DISTINCT f1.orderNo) AS payCount ,SUM(f1.payMentAmount) AS payMentAmount
FROM tbl_order_list_base b
LEFT JOIN tbl_order_lending_statistics l ON l.orderNo=b.orderNo
LEFT JOIN tbl_finance_receivable_for f1 ON f1.orderNo=b.orderNo
WHERE b.cooperativeAgencyId in (${agencyIds}) AND b.productCode!='04' AND b.state!='已关闭'
GROUP BY b.cooperativeAgencyId
SELECT f.id AS fundId, fundName, fundCode FROM tbl_customer_fund f WHERE f.`status`=1 GROUP BY f.id
SELECT count(f.id) FROM tbl_customer_fund f WHERE `status`=1
SELECT f.id,f.fundName,f.fundCode FROM tbl_customer_fund f WHERE f.`status` = 1

mapper.update:

updateUid = #{updateUid},

,SUM(ls.income) AS income
,SUM(ls.lendingAmount) AS lendingAmount
,SUM(ls.interest) AS interest
,SUM(ls.fine) AS fine
,SUM(ls.serviceCharge) AS serviceCharge

and ls.channelManagerUid in
